attributes.action: Support British Military Veterans (including the Ghurkas).
attributes.additional_details: The Armed Forces in this country have carried out the duties expected of them and the Government does not treat them respect.
attributes.background: With the recent events in Afghanistan, the British Government should give British Veterans (including the Ghurkas) priority for poper housing and support before any refugees.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/585941
